project.description: PDF Renderer library based on https://svn.java.net/svn/pdf-renderer version Version: 0.9.1 (https://svn.java.net/svn/pdf-renderer~svn/tags/release-0.9.1) added patches from nexus-pdfrenderer-0.9.1 (https://artifacts.alfresco.com/nexus/content/repositories/thirdparty/com/sun/pdfview/pdfrenderer/0.9.1-patched/pdfrenderer-0.9.1-patched-sources.zip) some patches from https://github.com/katjas/PDFrenderer
